title: Bug 28974 - Compiler error when introducing a 'final' field
description: This bug report addresses a compilation issue when introducing a 'final' field in an aspect.
OB: The observed behavior is that the provided aspect fails to compile with version 1.1b2 of the software, resulting in a compilation error. The error message is: 'Cannot assign a value to the final field com.ibm.amc.DemoBean.ajc$interField$comibmamc$verbose!!'
EB: The expected behavior is that introducing a 'final' field in an aspect should compile successfully without any errors.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Attempt to compile the provided aspect with version 1.1b2 of the software.
2. Observe the compilation error message mentioned in the observed behavior.
